amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds in the bill for sanctuary cities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used in contravention of section 642(a) of the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996 (8 U.S.C. 1373(a)).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Salmon amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
